column5: Bass fishin the shallows would be fun in that  Its like an adult paddleboat???
ooops--misread the title. I thought it said Ultrastiff. I was all for that!!!
Kayaks; "They also put you dangerously close to the surface of the water and wildlife that lives underneath". Oooooh, very scary
Looks like a high-tech version of a coracle. I'm betting a Welshman was involved in designing that!
